2: sngags <mistake>so// H phu'i</mistake> rnam pas mtha' yas kyi gzugs <mistake>brnan</mistake> byas la bdud rtsi ldas ni blugs/me tog nag pos <mistake>na</mistake> mchod/ klu 'dul bar byed pa'i khu bas ni byug /glang po che'i chang
3: gis ni <mistake>mgo</mistake> <mistake>bo byugs/ kham</mistake> <mistake>phor</mistake> <mistake>kha</mistake> <mistake>sbyor</mistake> <mistake>du</mistake> <mistake>ni bzhag</mistake> <mistake>pa nag</mistake> <mistake>mo'</mistake> 'o <mistake>ms</mistake> ni <mistake>dgang /gzhon</mistake> nu ma nag mos bkal ba'i skud pas ni <mistake>dkri /rlung</mistake> gi phyogs su <mistake>djzing</mistake> bu <mistake>bas</mistake> te mtha' yas der
4: <mistake>bzhag</mistake> <mistake>go /de'i</mistake> <mistake>gram</mistake> du dkyil 'khor bzhengs <mistake>par</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> <mistake>ste/dur</mistake> khrod kyi sol bas <mistake>ni rdul</mistake> tshon nag <mistake>po//skyes</mistake> pa'i rus pa'i <mistake>phyems</mistake> <mistake>ni rdul</mistake> tshon dkar <mistake>po/ / ldong</mistake> <mistake>ros</mistake> kyis ni rdul tshon ser <mistake>po/</mistake>
5: dur khrod kyi so phag <mistake>gisa</mistake> ni rdul tshon dmar po <mistake>tkun</mistake> ma'i lo ma <mistake>dang /skyes</mistake> pa'i rus pa'i phye ma dag gis ni rdul tshon ljang <mistake>khu</mistake> <mistake>ste / rdul</mistake> tshon 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengs so//dur khrod
6: kyi srad <mistake>bus</mistake> thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa bya <mistake>ste /de'i</mistake> dbus su mtha' yas mnan pa'i <mistake>kya'i</mistake> rdo rje zhal brgyad <mistake>pa /zhabs</mistake> bzhi pa phyag bcu drug gis brgyan <mistake>pa/sbyan</mistake> nyi shu rtsa <mistake>bzhi</mistake>
7: phye <mistake>ba/'jigs</mistake> <mistake>pa 'ang</mistake> 'jigs par mdzad pa <mistake>bri'o//e</mistake> nas slob dpon gyis nang gi ma rungs pa'i sems kyis dben pa'i gnas su sngags bzla <mistake>ste/o</mistake> <mistake>bhu</mistake> ru <mistake>gyuru</mistake> ghu <mistake>tu</mistake> ghu <mistake>ru/ma</mistake> sa ma
8: sa <mistake>gtha</mistake> <mistake>Tag+ha</mistake> <mistake>lma/gtho</mistake> <mistake>la</mistake> ya <mistake>g+o</mistake> <mistake>ra</mistake> <mistake>ya/a</mistake> nan <mistake>takho</mistake> bha ka <mistake>ra</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> <mistake>n'ag'dhi</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> ta ye <mistake>dhe</mistake> he ru ru kas <mistake>bta bA</mistake> <mistake>ta</mistake> <mistake>ba/gtA</mistake> <mistake>n'A</mistake> <mistake>n'</mistake> <mistake>gaaA</mistake> kar <mistake>kha</mistake> ya <mistake>bar /la</mistake> <mistake>yag</mistake> <mistake>rdha</mistake> ya ta <mistake>r+kha</mistake> <mistake>ya/ phu phu phu/phulA phu phu puphu</mistake>
